scripts.not-win: ver && echo Not supported on Windows && exit 1 || exit 0
scripts.full-coverage: npm run clean && npm run coverage && npm run silent-coverage
scripts.merge-coverage: mkdir "coverage/tmp" && cp -r coverage/*/tmp/. coverage/tmp && c8 report -r=text-lcov > coverage.lcov
scripts.ci: npm run full-coverage && npm run merge-coverage
scripts.report: npm run ci && npx c8 report -r=html --report-dir coverage
